channel.title: Pages on James Horton
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on James Horton

item.description: Title: About Aurthor: James Date: 2017-04-01 Modified: 2021-02-08 So I’m an Electronic Engineer, who now spends most of his time doing DSP and Signal processing at work. I spend a lot of time working with MATLAB and Simulink in my day job as a “Systems Engineer” for a defence company. Outside of work you will find my experimenting with Software Defined Radio (SDR), open source FPGA boards, and 3D Printing.
